name: Samir
description: If you said her jokes are corny, she would reply, "Why so serious?"

set.set_2: Increase damage progressively by **1%** upon hitting a target. Stack up to **10**/**13/16**/**20** times. Lasts for **1.5** seconds.
set.set_4: Increase Dual EM Stars' electrical explosion damage by **16%**/**22%**/**30%**/**40%**.
